org.afree.ui
Class RectangleInsets

java.lang.Object
  org.afree.ui.RectangleInsets

public class RectangleInsets
extends java.lang.Object

Represents the insets for a RectShape, specified in absolute or relative terms. This class is immutable.

getUnitType

public UnitType getUnitType()
Returns the unit type (absolute or relative). This specifies whether the insets are measured as Java2D units or percentages.

Returns:
The unit type (never null).

createAdjustedRectShape

public RectShape createAdjustedRectShape(RectShape base,
                                         LengthAdjustmentType horizontal,
